articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Apple’s Craig Federighi on the long road to the iPad’s Mac-like multitasking - Ars Technica
articles.description: Federighi talks to Ars about why the iPad’s Mac-style multitasking took so long.

articles.author: Benj Edwards
articles.title: New Apple study challenges whether AI models truly “reason” through problems - Ars Technica
articles.description: Puzzle-based experiments reveal limitations of simulated reasoning, but others dispute findings.
